channel.title: Point Clouds on XYZ
channel.description: Recent content in Point Clouds on XYZ

item.title: Big Cypress
item.description: Cat Island Specimen: Big Cypress Location: Cat Island National Wildlife Refuge, Louisiana Latin Name: Taxodium distichum Common Name: Bald Cypress Estimated Age: 1500 Team: Brendan Harmon, Hye Yeon Nam, Javier Zamora, & Huan Guo Viewer Point Clouds: laz + e57 + pcd + xyz + 3dm Mesh: stl

item.title: About
item.description: This is a collection of point clouds from photogrammetry and laser scanning recording the cultural heritage of landscapes. The team from Louisiana State University’s College of Art and Design includes Prof. Brendan Harmon, Prof. Hye Yeon Nam, Prof. Nicholas Serrano, and Prof. William Ma. This research was supported by the LSU Center for GeoInformatics and funded by the National Park Service’s Historic Preservation Fund and the LSU Arts & Humanities Project Support Fund.
